snippet: Eiko, of the performance team Eiko & Koma, is staging a solo work in the cavernous 30th Street Station in Philadelphia.
abstract: Eiko, Japanese choreographer and dancer who forms half of performance team Eiko & Korma, is staging her first solo work in the 30th Street Station in Philadelphia; work, A Body in a Station, is informed by notions of solitude and vulnerability and is presented by the Pennsylvania Academy of the Fine Arts.
lead_paragraph: Eiko, of the performance team Eiko & Koma, is staging a solo work in the cavernous 30th Street Station in Philadelphia.

headline.seo: Eiko, Without Koma, Creates in Philadelphia and Fukushima
headline.main: For Half of a Dance Duo, a Venture Alone in a Crowd
